mapper.insert: INSERT INTO email_verification_tokens (user_id, token, expires_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{token}, #{expiresAt})
mapper.select: SELECT token_id, user_id, token, expires_at, verified_at, created_at FROM email_verification_tokens WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT token_id, user_id, token, expires_at, verified_at, created_at FROM email_verification_tokens WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND verified_at IS NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE email_verification_tokens SET expires_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND verified_at IS NULL AND expires_at > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
